desc: Removes a saved item (star) from an item.

token.desc: Authentication token bearing required scopes. Tokens should be passed as an HTTP Authorization header or alternatively, as a POST parameter.

channel.desc: Channel to remove star from, or channel where the message to remove star from was posted (used with `timestamp`).

file_comment.desc: File comment to remove star from.

timestamp.desc: Timestamp of the message to remove star from.

channel_not_found.desc: Channel, private group, or DM specified by `channel` does not exist

file_comment_not_found.desc: File comment specified by `file_comment` does not exist.

file_not_found.desc: File specified by `file` does not exist.

message_not_found.desc: Message specified by `channel` and `timestamp` does not exist.

not_starred.desc: The specified item is not currently starred by the authenticated user.
